headers.subject: Re: incorrect syntax issue
headers.received: (from crawler@localhost) by crawl-1.a.markmail.int (8.13.8/8.13.8/Submit) id m8NDBNkL009865 for steve.riddle.terrell@a.markmail.org; Tue, 23 Sep 2008 06:11:23 -0700

body.para: Those fields are varchar fields. But they may contain numeric data. If I don't cast the data to int, then it won't sort correctly if data is numeric. For example, if the data was 1, 2, 3, 11, 15, then it would incorrectly sort as 1, 11, 15, 2, 3.
